author: pbs.org
title: My Brother's Bomber (Episode 3) FRONTLINE
text: When filmmaker Ken Dornstein was 19, his older brother David was one of 189 Americans killed in the bombing of Pan Am Flight 103 over Lockerbie, Scotland. In the gripping conclusion to this three-part series, Dornstein continues on a quest for answers -- diving into the case files, assembling a list of suspected plotters, and tracking them across the Middle East and Europe.
